Description: Path to the routing parameters file.
Path to the network connectivity file.
Path to the file with runoff values to be routed.
Path where the outflows file should be saved.
Path where the LHS matrix should be cached.
Path where the LHS inverse matrix should be cached.
Path where the adjacency matrix should be cached.
Time interval in seconds between routing computations.
Time interval in seconds between writing flows to disc.
Minimum flow value allowed after each routing computation.
Maximum flow value allowed after each routing computation.
Path to the initial flows file.
Path to the initial runoff file.
Path where the final flows file should be saved.
Path where the final runoff file should be saved.
Path to a file where the log will be written.
A name for this job to be printed in debug statements.
Indicates whether or not to show a progress bar in debug statements: true or false.
